titleInfo.title: 1st Annual Jim Eanes-Old Dominon Blue Grass Festival (16819)

mods.abstract: One color window card (navy on light brown) announcing the 1st Annual Jim Eanes- Old Dominon Blue Grass Festival featuring Doc Watson, Ralph Stanley, Jimmy Martin, Moe Brandy, Wilma Lee, Stoney Cooper, Clinch Clan Mountain, Jim Eanes, and the Brown Family Square Dancers at Leatherwood Park in Martinsville, Virginia on August 21-24. Poster features metal photoplates of Doc Watson, Ralph Stanley, Jimmy Martin, and More Brandy. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/40370.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
